mapper.select: SELECT S.SHOP_NAME, MEMBER_CARD_CONSUME_AMT, MEMBER_CARD_CONSUME_COUNT, SPEEDY_CONSUME_AMT, SPEEDY_CONSUME_COUNT, CONSUME_AMT FROM (SELECT P.SHOP_CODE, NVL(SUM(P.CARD_PAY_AMT), 0) AS MEMBER_CARD_CONSUME_AMT, NVL(SUM(P.CARD_PAY_NUM), 0) AS MEMBER_CARD_CONSUME_COUNT, NVL(SUM(P.QUICK_PAY_AMT), 0) AS SPEEDY_CONSUME_AMT, NVL(SUM(P.QUICK_PAY_NUM), 0) AS SPEEDY_CONSUME_COUNT, NVL(SUM(P.PAY_AMT), 0) AS CONSUME_AMT FROM TB_MCHNT_STATISTICS M, TB_SHOP_STATISTICS SH, TB_POSIT_STATISTICS P WHERE M.ID = SH.MCHNT_STATISTICS_ID AND SH.ID = P.SHOP_STATISTICS_ID AND M.MCHNT_CODE = #{mchntCode} AND SH.SHOP_CODE = #{shopCode} AND M.SETTLE_DATE >= #{startTime} AND M.SETTLE_DATE <= #{endTime} GROUP BY P.SHOP_CODE) T, TB_SHOP_INF S WHERE S.SHOP_CODE = T.SHOP_CODE

SELECT NVL(SUM(MS.CARD_PAY_AMT), 0) AS MEMBER_CARD_CONSUME_AMT, NVL(SUM(MS.QUICK_PAY_AMT), 0) AS SPEEDY_CONSUME_AMT, NVL(SUM(MS.OL_RECHARGE_DEN), 0) AS XS_RECHARGE_TRANS_AMT, NVL(SUM(MS.OL_RECHARGE_AMT), 0) AS XS_RECHARGE_UPLOAD_AMT, NVL(SUM(MS.PF_RECHARGE_DEN), 0) AS PT_RECHARGE_TRANS_AMT, NVL(SUM(MS.PF_RECHARGE_AMT), 0) AS PT_RECHARGE_UPLOAD_AMT, NVL(SUM(MS.PF_SUBSIDY_NUM), 0) AS PT_SUBSIDY_COUNT, NVL(SUM(MS.PF_SUBSIDY_AMT), 0) AS PT_SUBSIDY_AMT, 0 AS MEMBER_CARD_BAL, NVL(SUM(MS.FEE), 0) AS SERVICE_CHARGE, NVL(SUM(MS.SETTLE_AMT), 0) AS SETTLE_AMT FROM TB_MCHNT_STATISTICS MS WHERE MS.SETTLE_DATE >= #{startTime} AND MS.SETTLE_DATE <= #{endTime} AND MS.MCHNT_CODE = #{mchntCode}

SELECT '总计' AS SHOP_NAME, SUM(MEMBER_CARD_CONSUME_AMT) AS MEMBER_CARD_CONSUME_AMT, SUM(MEMBER_CARD_CONSUME_COUNT) AS MEMBER_CARD_CONSUME_COUNT, SUM(SPEEDY_CONSUME_AMT) AS SPEEDY_CONSUME_AMT, SUM(SPEEDY_CONSUME_COUNT) AS SPEEDY_CONSUME_COUNT, SUM(CONSUME_AMT) AS CONSUME_AMT FROM (SELECT P.SHOP_CODE, NVL(SUM(P.CARD_PAY_AMT), 0) AS MEMBER_CARD_CONSUME_AMT, NVL(SUM(P.CARD_PAY_NUM), 0) AS MEMBER_CARD_CONSUME_COUNT, NVL(SUM(P.QUICK_PAY_AMT), 0) AS SPEEDY_CONSUME_AMT, NVL(SUM(P.QUICK_PAY_NUM), 0) AS SPEEDY_CONSUME_COUNT, NVL(SUM(P.PAY_AMT), 0) AS CONSUME_AMT FROM TB_MCHNT_STATISTICS M, TB_SHOP_STATISTICS SH, TB_POSIT_STATISTICS P WHERE M.ID = SH.MCHNT_STATISTICS_ID AND SH.ID = P.SHOP_STATISTICS_ID AND M.MCHNT_CODE = #{mchntCode} AND SH.SHOP_CODE = #{shopCode} AND M.SETTLE_DATE >= #{startTime} AND M.SETTLE_DATE <= #{endTime} GROUP BY P.SHOP_CODE) T, TB_SHOP_INF S WHERE S.SHOP_CODE = T.SHOP_CODE
